Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.colors

Class EditorColorPaletteFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.editor.colors.EditorColorPaletteFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditorColorPaletteFactoryImpl

    public abstract class EditorColorPaletteFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds an empty editor color palette. The constructed palette can be filled with EditorColorPalette.with...() methods.
    See Also:
    EditorColorPalette.withBackgroundColors(), EditorColorPalette.withForegroundColors()

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static EditorColorPaletteFactory getInstance()

      • getPalette

        public abstract EditorColorPalette getPalette(EditorColorsScheme scheme,
                                              Language language)
        Builds an empty palette object for the given scheme and language.
        Parameters:
        scheme - The editor color scheme to retrieve colors from.
        language - The language. It can be one of the following:
        • null - for colors not associated with any language.
        • Language.ANY - all available colors.
        • language - colors for the given language
        Returns:
        The empty color palette for the given scheme and language.
